metadata.name: PX4826E
metadata.description:
I undersigned SKYGOLPE certify that this work entitled: “PX4826E” realized in 2022 is an original work. This NFT certificate is to be considered linked to the correspondent physical work.

This certificate has been auctioned at Christie’s during “Trespassing III” (8-21, July 2022).

Artist: SKYGOLPE
Title: PX4826E
Series: Paint on Pixel
Year : 2022
Technique : acrylic on printed canvas
Support : cotton canvas
Dimensions : 100x70 cm
Position of the signature : behind the work, below 
Numbering : unique work 1/1

The painting is also containing an NFC chip that will be linked to the NFT
certificate. However, this shouldn't remove collectors or institutions from their responsibilities. It will still be in their hands to preserve this connection as the custodian between the physical work and the NFT certificate

To expand the view click following link: http://ipfs.skygolpe.xyz/ipfs/QmZd4a5bVCRxoZg4scChGwyrwkueKgq1zjUmEXhqegixEc/#/
